info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 30 at 12:08PM EDT until October 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting Fairfield and New Haven Counties. Housatonic River At Gaylordsville affecting Litchfield County. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 8.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Sat 11 am: 7.9 Forecast: Sat 2 pm 8.1 Sat 8 pm 8.1 Sun 2 am 7.8 Sun 8 am 7.5 Sun 2 pm 7.2 Sun 8 pm 6.9 Mon 2 am 6.7 Mon 8 am 6.4 Mon 2 pm 6.2 Mon 8 pm 5.9 Tue 2 am 5.7 Tue 8 am 5.5 &&
